resources.string: If you want to talk to other users, you need to join the same room, which means that the RoomIDs of both parties should be the same.
UserID should be generated by the developer and must be globally unique under the same AppID.
The StreamID should be generated by the developer and must be globally unique under the same AppID.

There are three ways to live playing stream:
1. L3: Enable L3 service on the console, and select "L3" for the streaming strategy
2. CDN Plus: Enable L3 and CDN services on the console, and contact technical support Support enabling CDN Plus capability, select "Default" for the pull strategy
3. CDN: Enable CDN service in the console, select "CDN" for the pull strategy

Live, there are three levels of L3, CDN Plus, and CDN. Among them, if you use CDN Plus or CDN for palying stream, you need to "retweet CDN". 
Choose one of the two ways to open:
1. (Recommended) Default dynamic retweet; (Contact technical support for configuration)
2. SDK interface/server interface dynamic retweet. 
Official website documentation
